title: Team up for the party IP Weekend! Any level :)
body: Join the group, ' Bonus IP Weekend ' and we can try get as many 5's as possible to get the boost :)

replies.body: Ok ill join i added u guys
If you wanna join the group,  go into the chat room panel next to your friend list, and then, ' Create or join a public chat room'. Chat room name is Party IP Weekend
